gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve the current UI modifications applied to my Jira project so that I can review the changes made.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of UI modifications, including their IDs, types, and descriptions, allowing me to understand the current state of the UI.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to create a new UI modification for my project to enhance user experience by adding a custom button.
gold.ideal: The API should accept the modification details and return the created modification's ID and confirmation of the successful creation.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to delete an outdated UI modification that is no longer relevant to ensure the interface remains clean and user-friendly.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified UI modification and return a success message.

gold.user: As a UX designer, I want to update an existing UI modification to improve its functionality based on user feedback.
gold.ideal: The API should accept the updated details and return the modified UI modification's ID along with a confirmation of the update.
